text: Jin Renqing (; 29 July 1944 â€“ 28 August 2021) was a Chinese politician. He was born in Suzhou, China. He was a member of the Communist Party. He was the Director of the State Taxation Administration from 1998 until 2003. He was later the Minister of Finance from 2003 until 2007. Jin died in a house fire in Beijing on 28 August 2021, aged 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:Deaths from fire
title: Jin Renqing
